item.title: Rail broken, 3rd January
item.description:
The perimeter rail is broken and needs an urgent repair. I believe this is not the only loose section at the moment. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 195, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Freezing temperatures, wet roads, no gritting, 3rd January
item.description:
All the way down Denmark Hill, water on the road, freezing temperatures and not a gritter in sight. Very poor council maintenance. Indeed, negligence if people slip or have accidents now on the road, it will be the council's responsibility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denmark Hill, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many bags of rubbish left on pavement in front of 15 Sladedale Road., 3rd January
item.description:
This is a regular event. Most weeks rubbish is dumped and not collected. Approximately 10 bags of rubbish have been left this time. I'm not sure for how long. They were there when I returned on 2nd January.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sladedale Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped kitchen waste, 3rd January
item.description:
Someone repeatedly dumps kitchen waste on the foot path on Fox Lane. It makes a horrible mess. They have been doing it for years. Please can you find out who it is and stop them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fox Lane, Palmers Green, Greater London

item.title: Huge pothole, 3rd January
item.description:
Huge pothole and a few smaller ones by Rosebery’s auction house The state of the roads in and around West Norwood is shocking, I think it’s the first year it’s so bad Wolfington road York hill Norwood road Rosendale road Idminston road At Julian’s farm road Cheviot road And many many others

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Knight's Hill, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Putting back the benches, 3rd January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxleas Close, Falconwood, Greater London
